Diary of Lydia:
.......................................................................................she is dead. I'm just here but she's dead. Who is she? I am here. Who am I? It is at the castle. Who is she? We had a deal. What a bargain? Who is he? I said I'll do it. Do what? I lost it. Lost what? I get it. I got what? Who is she?
I said I should do it. Do what? I lost it. What? I got it. Got that?
Turn the page.
